name: European Union Chamber of Commerce in China
membership: Member of the European Business Organisation (EBO) Worldwide Network
goal: As the independent voice of European business in China, we seek greater market access and improved operating conditions for European companies.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, External Relations, Trade
euInitiatives: EU-China Trade and Investment relations, EU-China Strategy, EU-China Comprehensive Agreement on Investment, Trade Defense Instruments, Overcapacity, European Economic Diplomacy
